result.purpose: Provides various utility functions and configurations to assist with common tasks in a Go application, including data manipulation, token generation, and handling of different data types.
result.architecture: The folder follows a modular architecture pattern, where each file encapsulates specific functionalities related to data handling, utility functions, and configurations, promoting separation of concerns and reusability.

pkg/helper/asyncq.go.purpose: Configures and returns Redis connection options for the asynq library.

pkg/helper/big.go.purpose: Provides utility functions for handling big integers and numeric types in PostgreSQL.

pkg/helper/binder.go.purpose: Provides custom binding functionality for Echo framework with header support.

pkg/helper/bytes.go.purpose: This file provides helper functions for handling file uploads and processing CSV data in an Echo web framework context.

pkg/helper/copy.go.purpose: This file provides type converters for various data types using the copier library.

pkg/helper/file.go.purpose: Extracts user addresses from a 2D slice of records with validation.

pkg/helper/hmac_token.go.purpose: Generates HMAC access tokens for HTTP requests.

pkg/helper/map.go.purpose: Provides utility functions for manipulating maps and extracting values.

pkg/helper/mapstruct.go.purpose: Decodes a map into a struct and validates it using the validator package.

pkg/helper/mapstruct_hook.go.purpose: Provides helper functions for binding struct fields to environment variables and converting string representations of byte sizes.

pkg/helper/mapstruct_test.go.purpose: Unit tests for decoding a struct and validating its fields using mapstructure.

pkg/helper/number.go.purpose: Provides utility functions for parsing numbers and converting hexadecimal strings to big integers.

pkg/helper/operations.go.purpose: Provides a generic ternary function for conditional value selection.

pkg/helper/pagination.go.purpose: Provides pagination utilities for calculating offsets and limits for paginated data.

pkg/helper/pointer.go.purpose: Provides utility functions for working with pointers in a generic way.

pkg/helper/push_token.go.purpose: This file provides functions to hide sensitive tokens by obscuring their representation.

pkg/helper/ronin.go.purpose: Provides utility functions for Ethereum address normalization and signature verification.

pkg/helper/slice.go.purpose: Provides utility functions for manipulating slices and collections.

pkg/helper/slice_test.go.purpose: Unit tests for the SliceChunk function to validate chunking behavior of slices.

pkg/helper/strings.go.purpose: Provides utility functions for string manipulation and fallback value handling.

pkg/helper/sync.go.purpose: Provides utility functions for concurrent processing and aggregation of slices.

pkg/helper/time.go.purpose: Provides utility functions for handling time-related operations.

pkg/helper/tls.go.purpose: This file provides a function to create a TLS configuration from provided certificate, key, and CA certificate.

pkg/helper/type.go.purpose: Defines a generic Set data structure for managing unique items.
